Translations.Text: Mt. Sinai
zapysane svyate pysannya
Publikuvav u knyhakh
frequented Shrine
exalted stelya
more shcho vstanovlyuyetʹsya aflame
Vash requital Lorda unavoidable
Niyaka syla u vsesviti ne mozhe zupynyty tse
denʹ prybude koly nebo bude nasylʹnytsʹko hrim
hory budutʹ vytyratysya
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do disbelievers
khto ye u yikh blundering, neuvazhnyy
Vony budutʹ herded u Gehenna, forcibly
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Vohonʹ u kotromu vy vykorystaly disbelieve
tse zacharuvannya, abo vy ne dyvytesʹ
Strazhdayutʹ horyachyy. Chy vy patsiyent abo neterplyachyy, tse bude te zhe dlya vas. Tse yavlyaye soboyu spravedlyvi requital za shcho vy
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta blazhenstvo
Vony polyublyayutʹ yakoho yikhnʹoho Lorda zarezervuvaly dlya nykh; yikhniy Lord zekonomyv yikh retribution Pekla
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily, v obmin na vashi pratsi
Vony rozslablyayutʹsya na rozkishnomu vbranni, ta my match yim z krasyvym podruzhzhyam

Dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly, ta yikhni dity takozh proslidkuvaly za nymy u viri, my budemo maty yikhnikh ditey pryyednuyemosʹ do nykh. My nikoly ne ne spromozhemosʹ shchob nahorodyty yikh dlya budʹ-yakoyi roboty. Kozhna lyudyna platytʹsya za yakyy vin
My budemo postachaty yikh z fruktamy ta m'yasom shcho vony lyublyatʹ
Vony otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid napoyu shcho nikoly zabrudnyuyutʹsya, ta nikoly sinful ne vypyty
Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ sluzhbovtsi lyublyatʹ zakhyshcheni perly
Vony zustrinutʹ odyn odnoho ta reminisce sered sebe
Vony skazhutʹ, "My zvychayno buly riznovyd ta skromnyy sered nashykh lyudey
BOH blahoslovyv nas, ta zekonomyv nas ahoniya khvorykh vitru
My zvychayno blahaly Yoho; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Lyub'yaznyy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
